GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
dmaengine: sf-pdma: Add multithread support for a DMA channel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit b9b4992f897be9b0b9e3a3b956cab6b75ccc3f11, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 6973886ad58e6b4988813331abb76ae0b364a9c2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: sf-pdma: Add multithread support for a DMA channel
